name: Palace Guard
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Palace Guard and have them choose either clockwise or counter-clockwise. Then show them a token of a character seated closer to them in that direction than the other.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Palace Guard and show them a character token of a character seated further in the initially chosen direction than the character shown last night.
ability: You start by choosing a direction, even if drunk or poisoned. Each night, learn a character of a player further in that direction than last night's character.
